body.p: You can manage notifications templates (contact templates) to configure how and when send mails on critical check.
You can access to this menu by Plugins > Monitoring > Contact templates.
body.note: You must create at least one default template.
body.p: After have created templates, you can assign a template to an user account (if you don't want using the default template for this user). For this, see tab Monitoring-Contact in a user form (menu Administration > Users).
